0011000111000011 0100000101010000 1 -> sum: 0111001100010100, cout: 0
1110000001110101 0011011001001001 1 -> sum: 0001011010111111, cout: 1

1101010100100001 1000111111011100 0 -> sum: 0110010011111101, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
